trans-unit.source: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with Workday | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with Workday | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use Workday with Azure Active Directory to enable single sign-on, automated provisioning, and more!.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use Workday with Azure Active Directory to enable single sign-on, automated provisioning, and more!.

trans-unit.source: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with Workday
trans-unit.target: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with Workday

trans-unit.source: The objective of this tutorial is to show the integration of Azure and Workday.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this tutorial is to show the integration of Azure and Workday.

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:

trans-unit.source: A valid Azure subscription
trans-unit.target: A valid Azure subscription

trans-unit.source: A tenant in Workday
trans-unit.target: A tenant in Workday

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of the following building blocks:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of the following building blocks:

trans-unit.source: Enabling the application integration for Workday
trans-unit.target: Enabling the application integration for Workday

trans-unit.source: Configuring single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configuring single sign-on

trans-unit.source: Configuring user provisioning
trans-unit.target: Configuring user provisioning

trans-unit.source: Configuring user provisioning
trans-unit.target: Configuring user provisioning

trans-unit.source: Scenario
trans-unit.target: Scenario

trans-unit.source: Enabling the application integration for Workday
trans-unit.target: Enabling the application integration for Workday

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for Salesforce.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for Salesforce.

trans-unit.source: To enable the application integration for Workday, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To enable the application integration for Workday, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click **Active Directory**.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click **Active Directory**.

trans-unit.source: Active Directory
trans-unit.target: Active Directory

trans-unit.source: From the **Directory** list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.
trans-unit.target: From the **Directory** list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.

trans-unit.source: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click **Applications** in the top menu.
trans-unit.target: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click **Applications** in the top menu.

trans-unit.source: Applications
trans-unit.target: Applications

trans-unit.source: To open the **Application Gallery**, click **Add An App**, and then click **Add an application for my organization to use**.
trans-unit.target: To open the **Application Gallery**, click **Add An App**, and then click **Add an application for my organization to use**.

trans-unit.source: What do you want to do?
trans-unit.target: What do you want to do?

trans-unit.source: In the **search box**, type **Workday**.
trans-unit.target: In the **search box**, type **Workday**.

trans-unit.source: Workday
trans-unit.target: Workday

trans-unit.source: In the results pane, select **Workday**, and then click **Complete** to add the application.
trans-unit.target: In the results pane, select **Workday**, and then click **Complete** to add the application.

trans-unit.source: Workday
trans-unit.target: Workday

trans-unit.source: Configuring single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configuring single sign-on

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable users to authenticate to Workday with their account in Azure AD using federation based on the SAML protocol.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable users to authenticate to Workday with their account in Azure AD using federation based on the SAML protocol.

trans-unit.source: As part of this procedure, you are required to create a base-64 encoded certificate.
trans-unit.target: As part of this procedure, you are required to create a base-64 encoded certificate.

trans-unit.source: If you are not familiar with this procedure, see [How to convert a binary certificate into a text file](http://youtu.be/PlgrzUZ-Y1o).
trans-unit.target: If you are not familiar with this procedure, see [How to convert a binary certificate into a text file](http://youtu.be/PlgrzUZ-Y1o).

trans-unit.source: To configure single sign-on, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To configure single sign-on, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: On the **Workday** application integration page, click **Configure single sign-on** to open the **Configure Single Sign On ** dialog.
trans-unit.target: On the **Workday** application integration page, click **Configure single sign-on** to open the **Configure Single Sign On ** dialog.

trans-unit.source: Configure single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configure single sign-on

trans-unit.source: On the **How would you like users to sign on to Workday** page, select **Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On**, and then click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: On the **How would you like users to sign on to Workday** page, select **Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On**, and then click **Next**.

trans-unit.source: Configure single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configure single sign-on

trans-unit.source: On the **Configure App URL** page, perform the following steps, and then click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: On the **Configure App URL** page, perform the following steps, and then click **Next**.

trans-unit.source: Configure App URL
trans-unit.target: Configure App URL

trans-unit.source: In the **Sign On URL** textbox, type the URL used by your users to sign in to Workday (e.g.: *https://impl.workday.com/\<tenant\>/login-saml2.htmld*)
trans-unit.target: In the **Sign On URL** textbox, type the URL used by your users to sign in to Workday (e.g.: *https://impl.workday.com/\<tenant\>/login-saml2.htmld*)

trans-unit.source: In the **Workday Reply URL** textbox, type the Workday reply URL (e.g.: *https://impl.workday.com/\<tenant\>/login-saml.htmld*).
trans-unit.target: In the **Workday Reply URL** textbox, type the Workday reply URL (e.g.: *https://impl.workday.com/\<tenant\>/login-saml.htmld*).

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] Your reply URL must have a sub-domain (e.g.: www, wd2, wd3, wd3-impl, wd5, wd5-impl).
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] Your reply URL must have a sub-domain (e.g.: www, wd2, wd3, wd3-impl, wd5, wd5-impl).

trans-unit.source: Using something like "*http://www.myworkday.com*" works but "*http://myworkday.com*" does not.
trans-unit.target: Using something like "*http://www.myworkday.com*" works but "*http://myworkday.com*" does not.

trans-unit.source: On the **Configure single sign-on at Workday** page, to download your certificate, click **Download certificate**, and then save the certificate file on your computer.
trans-unit.target: On the **Configure single sign-on at Workday** page, to download your certificate, click **Download certificate**, and then save the certificate file on your computer.

trans-unit.source: Configure single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configure single sign-on

trans-unit.source: In a different web browser window, log into your Workday company site as an administrator.
trans-unit.target: In a different web browser window, log into your Workday company site as an administrator.

trans-unit.source: Go to **Menu \> Workbench**.
trans-unit.target: Go to **Menu \> Workbench**.

trans-unit.source: Workbench
trans-unit.target: Workbench

trans-unit.source: Go to **Account Administration**.
trans-unit.target: Go to **Account Administration**.

trans-unit.source: Account Administration
trans-unit.target: Account Administration

trans-unit.source: Go to **Edit Tenant Setup – Security**.
trans-unit.target: Go to **Edit Tenant Setup – Security**.

trans-unit.source: Edit Tenant Security
trans-unit.target: Edit Tenant Security

trans-unit.source: In the **Redirection URLs** section, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: In the **Redirection URLs** section, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: Redirection URLs
trans-unit.target: Redirection URLs

trans-unit.source: Click **Add Row**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Add Row**.

trans-unit.source: In the **Login Redirect URL** textbox and the **Mobile Redirect URL** textbox, type the **Workday Tenant URL** you have entered on the **Configure App URL** page of the Azure portal.
trans-unit.target: In the **Login Redirect URL** textbox and the **Mobile Redirect URL** textbox, type the **Workday Tenant URL** you have entered on the **Configure App URL** page of the Azure portal.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure portal, on the **Configure single sign-on at Workday** dialog page, copy the **Single Sign-Out Service URL**, and then paste it into the **Logout Redirect URL** textbox.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure portal, on the **Configure single sign-on at Workday** dialog page, copy the **Single Sign-Out Service URL**, and then paste it into the **Logout Redirect URL** textbox.

trans-unit.source: In **Environment** textbox, type the environment name.
trans-unit.target: In **Environment** textbox, type the environment name.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] The value of the Environment attribute is tied to the value of the tenant URL:
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] The value of the Environment attribute is tied to the value of the tenant URL:

trans-unit.source: If the domain name of the Workday tenant URL starts with impl (e.g.: *https://impl.workday.com/\<tenant\>/login-saml2.htmld*), the **Environment** attribute must be set to Implementation.
trans-unit.target: If the domain name of the Workday tenant URL starts with impl (e.g.: *https://impl.workday.com/\<tenant\>/login-saml2.htmld*), the **Environment** attribute must be set to Implementation.

trans-unit.source: If the domain name starts with something else, you need to contact Workday to get the matching **Environment** value.
trans-unit.target: If the domain name starts with something else, you need to contact Workday to get the matching **Environment** value.

trans-unit.source: In the **SAML Setup** section, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: In the **SAML Setup** section, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: SAML Setup
trans-unit.target: SAML Setup

trans-unit.source: Select **Enable SAML Authentication**.
trans-unit.target: Select **Enable SAML Authentication**.

trans-unit.source: Click **Add Row**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Add Row**.

trans-unit.source: In the SAML Identity Providers section, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: In the SAML Identity Providers section, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: SAML Identity Providers
trans-unit.target: SAML Identity Providers

trans-unit.source: In the Identity Provider Name textbox, type a provider name (e.g.: *SPInitiatedSSO*).
trans-unit.target: In the Identity Provider Name textbox, type a provider name (e.g.: *SPInitiatedSSO*).

trans-unit.source: In the Azure portal, on the **Configure single sign-on at Workday** dialog page, copy the **Identity Provider ID** value, and then paste it into the **Issuer** textbox.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure portal, on the **Configure single sign-on at Workday** dialog page, copy the **Identity Provider ID** value, and then paste it into the **Issuer** textbox.

trans-unit.source: Select **Enable Workday Initialted Logout**.
trans-unit.target: Select **Enable Workday Initialted Logout**.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure portal, on the **Configure single sign-on at Workday** dialog page, copy the **Single Sign-Out Service URL** value, and then paste it into the **Logout Request URL** textbox.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure portal, on the **Configure single sign-on at Workday** dialog page, copy the **Single Sign-Out Service URL** value, and then paste it into the **Logout Request URL** textbox.

trans-unit.source: Perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: Perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: SSO configuration
trans-unit.target: SSO configuration

trans-unit.source: Enable the **x509 Private Key Pair**.
trans-unit.target: Enable the **x509 Private Key Pair**.

trans-unit.source: In the **Service Provider ID** textbox, type **http://www.workday.com**.
trans-unit.target: In the **Service Provider ID** textbox, type **http://www.workday.com**.

trans-unit.source: Select **Enable SP Initiated SAML Authentication**.
trans-unit.target: Select **Enable SP Initiated SAML Authentication**.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure portal, on the **Configure single sign-on at Workday** dialog page, copy the **Single Sign-On Service URL** value, and then paste it into the **IdP SSO Service URL** textbox.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure portal, on the **Configure single sign-on at Workday** dialog page, copy the **Single Sign-On Service URL** value, and then paste it into the **IdP SSO Service URL** textbox.

trans-unit.source: 12.5 Select **Do Not Deflate SP-initiated Authentication Request**.
trans-unit.target: 12.5 Select **Do Not Deflate SP-initiated Authentication Request**.

trans-unit.source: As **Authentication Request Signature Method**, select **SHA256**.
trans-unit.target: As **Authentication Request Signature Method**, select **SHA256**.

trans-unit.source: ![Authentication Request Signature Method](./media/active-directory-saas-workday-tutorial/IC782932.png "Authentication Request Signature Method")
trans-unit.target: ![Authentication Request Signature Method](./media/active-directory-saas-workday-tutorial/IC782932.png "Authentication Request Signature Method")

trans-unit.source: 12.7 Click **OK**.
trans-unit.target: 12.7 Click **OK**.

trans-unit.source: ![OK](./media/active-directory-saas-workday-tutorial/IC782933.png "OK")
trans-unit.target: ![OK](./media/active-directory-saas-workday-tutorial/IC782933.png "OK")

trans-unit.source: In the Azure AD portal, on the **Configure single sign-on at Workday** page, click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure AD portal, on the **Configure single sign-on at Workday** page, click **Next**.

trans-unit.source: Configure single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configure single sign-on

trans-unit.source: On the **Single sign-on confirmation** page, click **Complete**.
trans-unit.target: On the **Single sign-on confirmation** page, click **Complete**.

trans-unit.source: Configure single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configure single sign-on

trans-unit.source: Configuring user provisioning
trans-unit.target: Configuring user provisioning

trans-unit.source: To get a test user provisioned into Workday, you need to contact the Workday support team.
trans-unit.target: To get a test user provisioned into Workday, you need to contact the Workday support team.

trans-unit.source: The Workday support team will create the user for you.
trans-unit.target: The Workday support team will create the user for you.

trans-unit.source: Assigning users
trans-unit.target: Assigning users

trans-unit.source: To test your configuration, you need to grant the Azure AD users you want to allow using your application access to it by assigning them.
trans-unit.target: To test your configuration, you need to grant the Azure AD users you want to allow using your application access to it by assigning them.

trans-unit.source: To assign users to Workday, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To assign users to Workday, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: In the Azure AD portal, create a test account.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure AD portal, create a test account.

trans-unit.source: On the **Workday **application integration page, click **Assign users**.
trans-unit.target: On the **Workday **application integration page, click **Assign users**.

trans-unit.source: Assign Users
trans-unit.target: Assign Users

trans-unit.source: Select your test user, click **Assign**, and then click **Yes** to confirm your assignment.
trans-unit.target: Select your test user, click **Assign**, and then click **Yes** to confirm your assignment.

trans-unit.source: Yes
trans-unit.target: Yes

trans-unit.source: If you want to test your single sign-on settings, open the Access Panel.
trans-unit.target: If you want to test your single sign-on settings, open the Access Panel.

trans-unit.source: For more details about the Access Panel, see [Introduction to the Access Panel](active-directory-saas-access-panel-introduction.md).
trans-unit.target: For more details about the Access Panel, see [Introduction to the Access Panel](active-directory-saas-access-panel-introduction.md).
